Knight Rider (2008)

(a Titles &
Air Dates Guide)

by this TV.com editor
aired from: Feb 2008
to: Mar 2009		 17 eps + pilot movie NBC 60 min
  • Justin Bruening as Mike Tracer
  • Deanna Russo as Sarah Graiman
  • Sydney Tamiia Poitier as Carrie Rivai
  • Val Kilmer as voice of K.I.T.T.
  • Paul Campbell as Billy Morgan
  • Yancey Arias as Alex Torres
  • Bruce Davison as Charles Graiman
  • Smith Cho as Zoe
